name: Bike It VR
description:
Wanna feel cool? I got ya brother. ;)

Like really what's cooler than driving a motorcycle, shooting, explosions, and literally flying in the skatepark?
Just a friendly warning, you better play this one sitting. It makes even me a bit motion sick.

Hello guys,

I am Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
